name: Mauve
publications: Aaron C.E. Darling, Bob Mau, Frederick R. Blatter, and Nicole T. Perna. 2004. Mauve: multiple alignment of conserved genomic sequence with rearrangements. Genome Research. 14(7):1394-1403.
Aaron E. Darling, Bob Mau, and Nicole T. Perna. 2010. progressiveMauve: Multiple Genome Alignment with Gene Gain, Loss, and Rearrangement. PLoS One. 5(6):e11147.
description: System for efficiently constructing multiple genome alignments in the presence of large-scale evolutionary events such as rearrangement and inversion
